POST http://localhost:3000/create

No login needed currently

JSON-Body:
{
    "metadata":"MetadataOfATemplate",
    "texts":
    [
        [
        "nameOfMeme1",
        "descriptionOfMeme1",
        ["text1OfMeme1","text2OfMeme1"],
        ["xCoordinateOfText1","xCoordinateOfText2"],
        ["yCoordinateOfText1", "yCoordinateOfText2"],
        ["xSizeOfText1", "xSizeOfText2"],
        ["ySizeOfText1", "ySizeOfText2"]
        ],
        [
        "nameOfMeme2",
        "descriptionOfMeme2",
        ["text1OfMeme2","text2OfMeme2"],
        ["xCoordinateOfText1","xCoordinateOfText2"],
        ["yCoordinateOfText1", "yCoordinateOfText2"],
        ["xSizeOfText1", "xSizeOfText2"],
        ["ySizeOfText1", "ySizeOfText2"]
        ]
    ]
}
